Smart Chickens are just regular chickens indocrinated into believing they're part of the intellectual caste. Don't mention it to them, or they'll get really agitated and give you a spicy peck.
Lay Item: Books!$(br2)The literature these chickens produce wouldn't be readable even if it was legible. Thankfully, most pages are untouched.
Make a Chicken read a Book. Warranty void when applied.
